title: Electrical And Automation Engineer
company_name: CÔNG TY TNHH CHẾ BIẾN THỰC PHẨM OLAM VIỆT NAM
job_description:
- Issue and control all records and documents related to the electrical system, measuring equipment and automation of the factory, including: procedures, work instructions, record forms.
- Plan, implement and monitor the implementation of periodic maintenance work to ensure that the machinery always meets the production plan, safety requirements and product quality.
- Build annual maintenance costs for each machine and monitor monthly usage to ensure that the budget is used according to the approved plan and budget.
- Participate in projects to upgrade and install new machines. Ensure projects are implemented on time, on budget and without safety and quality issues.
- Propose improvement projects to increase capacity, improve safe working conditions, improve product quality, increase the reliability of production equipment.
- Make weekly, monthly and annual reports.
- Make a list of critical spare parts to ensure that there are spare parts available when damage occurs or when performing periodic maintenance activities.
- Create PR and monitor the progress of PO issuance, receiving goods and GR for spare parts and repair services on time.
- Develop maintenance instructions and conduct training for maintenance department staff as well as other departments to share knowledge and improve skills in troubleshooting, operating and maintaining machines.
- Implement machine function improvements through editing PLC or HMI programs.
- Other tasks assigned by the department head.
requirements:
Bachelor degree: Electrical, automation or mechatronic major.
Fluent English, use the MS office ( Word, Excel, Power Point), PLC and HMI programming (Siemens and Rockwell Automation)
Negotiate, effective communication Skill
Working experience : More than 3 years
